resources.string: Korean food, Korean drama, Kpop become more and more popular. Consequently, many people get interested in learing Korean. This application isn\'t only suitable for whom persues Topik certificate, but also good for practice reading and listening Korean. Hope all you to spend useful time with it. If there is any wrong in content, please feel free to contact with me via doanhuunoi@gmail.com. Thank you.
